message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 9-2-1, translated into all languages

data.fr:
Méthodologie

Méthode de calcul:

Proportion de MVA au PIB = MVA/PIB*100.

MVA par habitant = MVA/population
data.en:
Methodology

Computation method:

MVA proportion to GDP = MVA/GDP*100.

MVA per capita = MVA/population
